ygData.subject: Re: Active servers?
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow it s nice to see that the servers are still active. I will start a newbie toon on Drinal then. ... Marr). Sony is planning a new expansion in November.To:
ygData.messageBody:
Wow it's nice to see that the servers are still active. I will start a
newbie toon on Drinal then.

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, David Kahan <trekkie61@...> wrote:
>
>
> The game is still pretty active. I play on Drinal (formally Tarew
Marr). Sony is planning a new expansion in November.To: EverQuest@...:

> I'm an old EQ player from the Kunark days who left for
(shiver) EQ2
> then for another MMORG. I'm thinking of making a return to EQ1 as the
> bug to play seems to have left for the other game....tooo many kids
> and it's becoming a job. I remember many sleepless nights exploring
> Norath, Grinding with others on the plains of Karana and actually
> enjoying it. Anyone still out there? I've looked at the forum activity
> and wasn't very hopeful, but the game looks to be active as far as
> current expansions and whatnot.
